**Key design features**  
| Feature | Detail |
|---|---|
| **Test article** | Whole‑food diet containing 33 % (by weight) of a genetically modified maize (NK603) that expresses a glyphosate‑tolerant EPSPS enzyme, plus the same diet spiked with the commercial Roundup formulation (to mimic realistic exposure). |
| **Control** | Identical diet formulated with the non‑GM near‑isogenic maize and no added herbicide. |
| **Species & numbers** | 200 Sprague‑Dawley rats (100 M / 100 F), 10 rats per sex per group, followed for the full 2‑year lifespan (the standard “chronic” period for carcinogenicity testing). |
